relation: Great for these types of students
Students welling to learn, have fun, and not party.
Bingo, sport game, dancing, idol, movie night, go see musicals, go to seven spring, and attend professional sport game.
Apply now, stay on campus, do an overnight stay, and get involved.

textAfterTable: Great for these types of students laid-back, hard working, looking to meet people. Tips for prospective students Tour the campus and spend the night with a student before deciding to attend. WU is very small and that should be considered. Bang for the buck Received a lot of scholarships from the school so if you have the grades, you will get the aid. Am enjoying being here It's a nice environment, but can get boring at times. Am learning a lot Great environment to learn...small classes and informative and helpful professors.
